findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions includeAccount() and _getCurrentSupply() may abort with OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long excluded addresses list.

findings.title: Potential out of gas exception in _getCurrentSupply function
findings.description: The function _getCurrentSupply uses a loop to evaluate total supply and could be aborted with OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long excluded addresses list.
